articles.title: Preparatory Committee Inaugurated in Denmark
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee Inaugurated in Denmark 
    Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee for the "meeting praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu" was held in Copenhagen on May 4.
 It was attended by representatives and members of political parties and organizations in Denmark.
 At the ceremony chairmen of different political parties including the Communist Party of Denmark (Marxist-Leninist) and other personages such as the chairman of the Denmark-DPRK 
Friendship Association were elected co-chairmen of the committee.    
 The committee discussed and decided on the issue of organizing colorful functions in Denmark in the run-up to the meeting.

articles.title: Letter of Protest to Japanese Chief Executive Conveyed
articles.content:
Letter of Protest to Japanese Chief Executive Conveyed 
    Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Members of the Tok Islet Fellowship Society of south Korea visited the Japanese embassy in Seoul to convey a letter of protest to the Japanese chief executive to it on May 6, according to south Korean KBS.
 Denouncing Japan for its brazen-faced moves to grab Tok Islet and distort history, the letter strongly urged him to honestly own the responsibility for them and apologize to the Korean people without delay.    
 Earlier, the organization held a rally denouncing Japan and staged a hair-cutting ceremony in token of its protest.
